content: This week we launched the FHIR Business Alliance, a group of companies that build interoperable solutions based on FHIR. The current members are 1upHealth, AEGIS, Firely and SmileCDR. Our first public appearance will be HIMSS 2020. Come visit us in booth 8200-69. We call ourselves FHIRBall. More here: https://www.fhirball.org/.

Kudos for the name! I'd even say FHIRBAll to emphasize the "Alliance" part, but not important.

"interoperable solutions" - a wide open description if there ever was one. Solutions to what? is the first question. Will read later.
